name: Zovirax
description: Chargrilled fresh tuna steak (served medium rare) on classic Ni√ßoise salad with French beans.

name: Mygest
description: Mygest 200mg Capsule is a natural female sex hormone, progesterone. It is used to treat menstrual and pregnancy-related issues that are caused due to hormonal imbalance.

name: Doxicap
description: Doxicap is a highly active broad-spectrum antibiotic of tetracycline group.

name: Seebri
description: Seebri Breezhaler is indicated as a once-daily maintenance bronchodilator treatment to relieve symptoms of patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).

name: Dilgly UniCap
description: Dilgly UniCap inhalation capsule is indicated as a once-daily maintenance bronchodilator treatment to relieve symptoms of patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).

name: Lotrel
description: LOTREL contains 2 prescription medicines that work together to lower blood pressure: amlodipine besylate, a calcium channel blocker, and benazepril hydrochloride, an ACE inhibitor.

name: Clarizol
description: Clarizol is a broad-spectrum antifungal agent that is used for the treatment of dermal infections caused by various species of pathogenic dermatophytes, yeasts, moulds and bacteroids.

name: Eyefen
description: Eyefen Eye Drop is composed of Flurbiprofen, an ophthalmic anti-inflammatory agent

name: Eyerin
description: Eyerin is used for the symptomatic treatment of dry eye conditions including keratoconjunctivitis sicca.

name: Inj. K MM
description: The anticoagulant should be withdrawn and an IV injection of Inj K MM given slowly (in at least 30 seconds) in a dose of 10-20 mg (1-2, 10 mg ampoules).

name: Supotaria
description: Adults: 0.2 mg to 0.4 mg intravenously or intramuscularly before the induction of anesthesia

name: Windel
description: Windel 0.5 injection: Each ampoule contains 1 ml sterile isotonic solution for injection of Salbutamol Sulphate BP equivalent to Salbutamol 0.5 mg.

name: Syrup Zinc
description: Syrup Zinc-200 10 mg/5 ml is indicated in zinc deficiency and/or zinc losing conditions

name: Adolef
description: This syrup is a preparation of a combination of effective herbs which is helpful in all types of cough & cold.

name: Acme's Basok
description: ACME'S BASOK syrup relieves allergic and dry imitable cough. It liquefies phlegm.

name: Twindopa
description: Twindopa tablet is indicated for the treatment of Parkinson's disease and syndrome

name: Tabis Plus
description: Tabis Plus tablet is indicated in the treatment of Hypertension.

name: Riovera
description: Riovera is indicated for the treatment of onchocerciasis due to the nematode parasite Onchocerca volvulus.

name: Vita D3
description: Vitamin D3 is essential for the effective calcium and phosphate absorption required for healthy bones and teeth, preventing rickets, osteomalacia and osteoporosis.

name: E-Cap Plus
description: Vitamin C: Necessary for collagen formation and tissue repair,Vitamin E plays a role in protecting red blood cells against hemolysis
